skills.name: ecbot rpa helper
skills.description: help fix failures during ecbot RPA runs.

skills.name: chatter for ecbot rpa helper
skills.description: human and agent chat for helping fix failures during ecbot RPA runs.

skills.name: ecbot rpa operator run RPA
skills.description: drive a bunch of bots to run their ecbot RPA works.

skills.name: chatter for ecbot rpa operator run RPA
skills.description: human and agent chat for RPA operator agent who drive a bunch of RPA bots to run their ecbot RPA works.

skills.name: ecbot rpa supervisor task scheduling
skills.description: help fix failures during ecbot RPA runs.

skills.name: chatter for ecbot rpa supervisor task scheduling
skills.description: human and agent chat for supervising ecbot RPA runs by the RPA operator agents.

skills.name: ecbot rpa supervisor serve requests
skills.description: help fix failures during ecbot RPA runs.

skills.name: ecbot rpa supervisor serve requests
skills.description: help fix failures during ecbot RPA runs.

skills.name: meca search 1688 web site
skills.description: help search a part/component or a product on 1688 website.

skills.name: chatter for meca search 1688 web site
skills.description: chat with human or other agents to help search a part/component or a product on 1688 website.

tools.name: rpa_supervisor_scheduling_work
tools.description: As a RPA supervisor, fetches daily work schedule and run team prep and get ready to dispatch the work to the operator agents on the remote hosts to work on.

tools.name: rpa_operator_dispatch_works
tools.description: As a RPA operator, it dispatches the RPA works to be performed by a platoon of bots on this host computer.

tools.name: rpa_supervisor_process_work_results
tools.description: As an RPA supervisor, update overall result with received operator work report.

tools.name: rpa_supervisor_run_daily_housekeeping
tools.description: As an RPA supervisor, after all work reports collected, do necessary housekeeping work such as accounting, book keeping etc.

tools.name: rpa_operator_report_work_results
tools.description: As an RPA operator, report work results to supervisor

tools.name: screen_capture
tools.description: Do a screen shot, save to a png file and stores into a cv2 image data structure

tools.name: screen_analyze
tools.description: do OCR and icon match on an image and result in structured text in the image

icons.description: a list of icon file names

tools.name: mouse_click
tools.description: a mouse click function using pyautogui.

button.description: could be left, right, or wheel

speed.description: time delay interval in seconds (could be fractional) between the two clicks

post_move.description: mouse move after click action [delta_x, delta_y]

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post click movement

tools.name: mouse_move
tools.description: a mouse move/hover function using pyautogui.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post movement

tools.name: mouse_drag_drop
tools.description: a mouse drag and drop function using pyautogui.

duration.description: time interval in seconds (could be fractional) between pick up and drop off

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post movement

tools.name: mouse_scroll
tools.description: a mouse drag and drop function using pyautogui.

duration.description: amount of mouse wheel scroll units

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post movement

tools.name: text_input
tools.description: keyboard type in text string.

text.description: text string to be typed in

speed.description: amount of time interval in seconds(can be fractional number) between key strokes

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post movement

tools.name: keys_input
tools.description: keyboard type combo hot keys.

keys.description: list of keys to be keyed in, for example ['ctrl', 'x']

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post movement

tools.name: wait
tools.description: wait a few seconds.

tools.name: say_hello
tools.description: just a test.

tools.name: in_browser_wait_for_element
tools.description: use python web tool to wait for web elements.

locator.description: type of the web element, could be ID, Name, ClassName, LinkText, PartialLinkText, TagName, CSS Selector, and XPath

timeout.description: number of seconds to wait before timeout

tools.name: in_browser_click_element_by_index
tools.description: use selenium to click on a web element based on index in the selector map.

locator.description: type of the web element, could be ID, Name, ClassName, LinkText, PartialLinkText, TagName, CSS Selector, and XPath

map.description: selector map from web page extraction.

tools.name: in_browser_click_element_by_selector
tools.description: use selenium to click on an web element based on selector.

selector.description: css selector name associated with the target web element

map.description: selector map from web page extraction.

tools.name: in_browser_click_element_by_xpath
tools.description: use selenium to click on an web element based on xpath.

xpath.description: xpath associated with the target web element

map.description: selector map from web page extraction.

tools.name: in_browser_click_element_by_text
tools.description: use selenium to click on an web element based on text

text.description: text associated with the target web element

map.description: selector map from web page extraction.

tools.name: in_browser_input_text
tools.description: key in text on a web page's input field.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post movement

tools.name: in_browser_scroll_down
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to scroll down within the browser.

amount.description: amount to scroll down on the web page.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post scroll

tools.name: in_browser_scroll_up
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to scroll up within the browser.

amount.description: amount to scroll up on the web page.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post scroll

tools.name: in_browser_send_keys
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to send hot keys to the web page.

amount.description: amount to scroll up on the web page.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post scroll

tools.name: in_browser_scroll_to_text
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to scroll to the specified text location.

text.description: amount to scroll up on the web page.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post scroll

tools.name: in_browser_get_dropdown_options
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to obtains the list of selection options on the drop down list.

text.description: amount to scroll up on the web page.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post scroll

tools.name: in_browser_select_dropdown_option
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to select an item on the drop down selection list.

text.description: amount to scroll up on the web page.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post scroll

tools.name: in_browser_drag_drop
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to drag and drop an item.

text.description: amount to scroll up on the web page.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post scroll

tools.name: in_browser_extract_content
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to drag and drop an item.

text.description: amount to scroll up on the web page.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post scroll

tools.name: in_browser_switch_tab
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to drag and drop an item.

tab_title.description: title text of the tab to switch to.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post scroll

tools.name: in_browser_open_tab
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to drag and drop an item.

url.description: the url of the new tab page.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post scroll

tools.name: in_browser_close_tab
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to drag and drop an item.

tab_title.description: title text of the tab to close.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post scroll

tools.name: in_browser_download_file
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to drag and drop an item.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after post scroll

tools.name: in_browser_go_to_url
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to open a new url site.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after attempting to open the url site

tools.name: in_browser_run_js
tools.description: use browser driver like selenium or playwright to inject js script into the page.

file.description: path of the file that contains the js code.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after attempting to open the url site

tools.name: reconnect_wifi
tools.description: use shell command to reconnect wifi (assume wifi access point porfiles exist).

wifi_name.description: name of the wifi access point.

post_wait.description: wait number of seconds after attempting to open the url site
